comment: Professor Pryor is great and committed to her students. Course accumulative grading is straight forward. Departmental mandated Exams are Monitor EDU enabled and excel project just like on 2101. Accounting is NOT for the lazy or procrastinators. Use of all your tutoring resources GTA's, Learning Center and if you are "desperate" Knack. Take Her!

ACCT2102 is NOT an easy ONLINECOURSE specially W/ MONITOR EDU.  Those rating her low did not apply themselves nor used all the available resources (GTA sessions, Learning Center and Kack Tutoring). Prof Pryor is an AMAZING human being. Caring, Knowledgeable and Dedicated to her Students; You Must Communicate otherwise how can anyone help you?

Simply put, don't take her.

Course:
1000-point grading scale with 4 exams worth 60% (150 each) of your grade. Exams use MonitorEDU, an annoying and time-consuming monitoring service. Ace EVERY assignment; every point matters.

Professor:
Chance of emails being replied to are random. Professor never posted her own lectures, review material is OK.

wouldn't recommend taking her class. There are only four exams the entire semester that about 60% of your grade. She is not very communitive and emails go unanswered for more then a week, and some emails that were sent was time urgent and she didn't reply until after the deadline passed. Not much help with studying to prepare us for the exams.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Graded by few things
